location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 343: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to William Taylour Thomson, Her Majesty's Chargé d'Affaires at the Court of Persia, Tehran

mods.abstract: Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, submits a copy of a letter (with its enclosures) addressed to Commodore George Robinson, which informs him of the alleged importation of slaves into the ports of Charrack [Bandar-e Chārak] and Kelat [Kelāt, Iran], and indicates the steps to be adopted in order to liberate those slaves. The letter and its enclosures are not included with this letter.
